description: This file defines the main Tetris game component for a React application, implementing gameplay logic, rendering, controls, scoring, and UI overlays for game over and pause states.

methods.name: getDropY
methods.description: Computes the lowest y-position a Tetromino can drop to without collision.

methods.name: getLevelByLines
methods.description: Determines the current game level based on total lines cleared.

methods.name: getScoreForClearedRows
methods.description: Calculates score based on the number of cleared rows and current level.

methods.name: initGame
methods.description: Initializes or resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: spawnPiece
methods.description: Generates and sets the next Tetromino piece for gameplay.

methods.name: fall
methods.description: Handles the automatic downward movement of the current piece, locking it if movement is blocked.

methods.name: drawCell
methods.description: Creates a styled div element representing a single cell on the game board.

methods.name: renderBoard
methods.description: Renders the current state of the game board, including ghost pieces and active Tetromino.
